content: {"name": "Creston Avenue Baptist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "http://www.crestonavenuebaptistchurch.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "114 East 188th Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Fordham Heights", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10468", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8616765, "longitude": -73.8991341}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 367-1754", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Get a number/ticket"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Requires 2 different proof of address that matches ID"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
